## Git Streak Tracker

**This app contains a selection of widgets to help users track their contribution streak on Github.**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/gibsonbailey/git-streak-tracker)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://git-streak-tracker.herokuapp.com/)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://github.com/gibsonbailey/git-streak-tracker)

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `username` | `string` | `true` |  | Username registered in GitHub | Example: `gibsonbailey` |

</details>

```txt
https://d3frb2mbny706b.cloudfront.net/{username}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

#### Git Streak Tracker

```markdown
<!-- gibsonbailey -->
![Git Streak Tracker](https://d3frb2mbny706b.cloudfront.net/gibsonbailey)
```
